ayas.arabic: إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُّبِينًا
ayas.translation: Surely We have given to you a clear victory
ayas.transliteration: innā fataḥnā laka fat-ḥan mubīnā

ayas.arabic: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنۢبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَٰطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
ayas.translation: That Allah may forgive your community their past faults and those to follow and complete His favor to you and keep you on a right way,
ayas.transliteration: liyaghfira lakallāhu mā taqaddama min dhanbika wa mā ta-akhhara wayutimma ni`matahu `alayka wayahdiyaka ṣirāṭan mustaqīmā

ayas.arabic: وَيَنصُرَكَ ٱللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
ayas.translation: And that Allah might help you with a mighty help.
ayas.transliteration: wayanṣurakallāhu naṣran `azīzā

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا مَّعَ إِيمَـٰنِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
ayas.translation: He it is Who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they might have more of faith added to their faith-- and Allah's are the hosts of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is Knowing, Wise--
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī anzalas sakīnata fī qulūbil mu-minīna liyazdādū-iymānan ma`a-iymānihim ۗ walillāhi junūdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wakānallāhu `alīman ḥakīmā

ayas.arabic: لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
ayas.translation: That He may cause the believing men and the believing women to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein and remove from them their evil; and that is a grand achievement with Allah
ayas.transliteration: liyudkhilal-mu-minīna wal mu-mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wayukaffira `anhum sayyi-ātihim ۚ wakāna dhālika `indallāhi fawzan `aẓīmā

ayas.arabic: وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَٱلْمُشْرِكَـٰتِ ٱلظَّآنِّينَ بِٱللَّهِ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: And (that) He may punish the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women, and the polytheistic men and the polytheistic women, the entertainers of evil thoughts about Allah. On them is the evil turn, and Allah is wroth with them and has cursed them and prepared hell for them, and evil is the resort.
ayas.transliteration: wayu`adhhibal munāfiqīna wal munāfiqāti wal mushrikīna wal mushrikātiẓ ẓānnīna billāhi ẓannas saw-i ۚ `alayhim dā-iratus saw-i ۖ waghaḍiballāhu `alayhim wala`anahum wa-a`adda lahum jahannam ۖ wasā-at maṣīrā

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
ayas.translation: And Allah's are the hosts of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: walillāhi junūdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wakānallāhu `azīzan ḥakīmā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ شَـٰهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
ayas.translation: Surely We have sent you as a witness and as a bearer of good news and as a warner,
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnāka shāhidan wa mubashhiran wanadhīrā

ayas.arabic: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
ayas.translation: That you may believe in Allah and His Apostle and may aid him and revere him; and (that) you may declare His glory, morning and evening.
ayas.transliteration: litu-minū billāhi warasūlihi watu`azzirūhu watuwaqqirūhu watusabbiḥūhu bukratan wa-aṣīlā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَـٰهَدَ عَلَيْهُ ٱللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
ayas.translation: Surely those who swear allegiance to you do but swear allegiance to Allah; the hand of Allah is above their hands. Therefore whoever breaks (his faith), he breaks it only to the injury of his own soul, and whoever fulfills what he has covenanted with Allah, He will grant him a mighty reward.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna yubāyi`ūnaka innamā yubāyi`ūnallāha yadullāhi fawqa aydīhim ۚ faman nakatha fa-innamā yankuthu `alā nafsih ۖ wa man awfā bimā `āhada `alayhullāha fasayu-tīhi ajran `aẓīmā

ayas.arabic: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَآ أَمْوَٰلُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًۢا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۢا
ayas.translation: Those of the dwellers of the desert who were left behind will say to you: Our property and our families kept us busy, so ask forgiveness for us. They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say: Then who can control anything for you from Allah if He intends to do you harm or if He intends to do you good; nay, Allah is Aware of what you do:
ayas.transliteration: sayaqūlu lakal mukhallafūna minal-a`rābi shaghalatnā amwālunā wa-ahlūnā fastaghfir lanā ۚ yaqūlūna bi-alsinatihim mā laysa fī qulūbihim ۚ qul faman yamliku lakum minallāhi shay-an in arāda bikum ḍarran aw arāda bikum naf`ā ۚ bal kānallāhu bimā ta`malūna khabīrā

ayas.arabic: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًۢا بُورًا
ayas.translation: Nay! you rather thought that the Apostle and the believers would not return to their families ever, and that was made fairseeming to your hearts and you thought an evil thought and you were a people doomed to perish.
ayas.transliteration: bal ẓanantum an lan yanqalibar rasūlu wal mu-minūna ilā ahlīhim abadan wazuyyina dhālika fī qulūbikum waẓanantum ẓannas saw-i wakuntum qawman būrā

ayas.arabic: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ فَإِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَعِيرًا
ayas.translation: And whoever does not believe in Allah and His Apostle, then surely We have prepared burning fire for the unbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: wa man lam yu-min billāhi warasūlihi fa-innā a`tadnā lilkāfirīna sa`īrā

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
ayas.translation: And Allah's is the kingdom. of the heavens and the earth; He forgives whom He pleases and punishes whom He pleases, and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: walillāhi mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ yaghfiru liman yashā-u wayu`adhhibu man yashā-u ۚ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā

ayas.arabic: سَيَقُولُ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا ٱنطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا۟ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
ayas.translation: Those who are left behind will say when you set forth for the gaining of acquisitions: Allow us (that) we may follow you. They desire to change the world of Allah. Say: By no means shall you follow us; thus did Allah say before. But they will say: Nay! you are jealous of us. Nay! they do not understand but a little.
ayas.transliteration: sayaqūlul mukhallafūna idhan-ṭalaqtum ilā maghānima lita-khudhūhā dharūnā nattabi`kum ۖ yurīdūna an yubaddilū kalāmallāh ۚ qul lan tattabi`ūnā kadhālikum qālallāhu min qabl ۖ fasayaqūlūna bal taḥsudūnanā ۚ bal kānū lā yafqahūna illā qalīlā

ayas.arabic: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُو۟لِى بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ تُقَـٰتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
ayas.translation: Say to those of the dwellers of the desert who were left behind: You shall soon be invited (to fight) against a people possessing mighty prowess; you will fight against them until they submit; then if you obey, Allah will grant you a good reward; and if you turn back as you turned back before, He will punish you with a painful punishment.
ayas.transliteration: qul lil-mukhallafīna minal-a`rābi satud`awna ilā qawmin ulī ba-sin shadīdin tuqātilūnahum aw yuslimūn ۖ fa-in tuṭī`ū yu-tikumullāhu ajran ḥasanā ۖ wa in tatawallaw kamā tawallaytum min qablu yu`adhhibkum `adhāban alīmā

ayas.arabic: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
ayas.translation: There is no harm in the blind, nor is there any harm in the lame, nor is there any harm in the sick (if they do not go forth); and whoever obeys Allah and His Apostle, He will cause him to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, and whoever turns back, He will punish him with a painful punishment.
ayas.transliteration: laysa `alal-a`mā ḥarajun walā `alal-a`raji ḥarajun walā `alal-marīḍi ḥaraj ۗ wa man yuṭi`illāha warasūlahu yudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wa man yatawalla yu`adhhibhu `adhāban alīmā

ayas.arabic: لَّقَدْ رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَـٰبَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
ayas.translation: Certainly Allah was well pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree, and He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down tranquillity on them and rewarded them with a near victory,
ayas.transliteration: laqad raḍiyallāhu `anil mu-minīna idh yubāyi`ūnaka taḥtash shajarati fa`alima mā fī qulūbihim fa-anzalas sakīnata `alayhim wa-athābahum fat-ḥan qarībā

ayas.arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
ayas.translation: And many acquisitions which they will take; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wa maghānima kathīratan ya-khudhūnahā ۗ wakānallāhu `azīzan ḥakīmā

ayas.arabic: وَعَدَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَـٰذِهِۦ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِىَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَٰطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
ayas.translation: Allah promised you many acquisitions which you will take, then He hastened on this one for you and held back the hands of men from you, and that it may be a sign for the believers and that He may guide you on a right path.
ayas.transliteration: wa`adakumullāhu maghānima kathīratan ta-khudhūnahā fa`ajjala lakum hādhihi wakaffa aydiyan nāsi `ankum walitakūna āyatan lil-mu-minīna wayahdiyakum ṣirāṭan mustaqīmā

ayas.arabic: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا۟ عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرًا
ayas.translation: And others which you have not yet been able to achieve Allah has surely encompassed them, and Allah has power over all things.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ukhrā lam taqdirū `alayhā qad aḥāṭallāhu bihā ۚ wakānallāhu `alā kulli shay-in qadīrā

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ قَـٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوَلَّوُا۟ ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: And if those who disbelieve fight with you, they would certainly turn (their) backs, then they would not find any protector or a helper.
ayas.transliteration: walaw qātalakumul ladhīna kafarū lawallawul-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīrā

ayas.arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِى قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
ayas.translation: Such has been the course of Allah that has indeed run before, and you shall not find a change in Allah's course.
ayas.transliteration: sunnatallāhil latī qad khalat min qabl ۖ walan tajida lisunnatil lāhi tabdīlā

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
ayas.translation: And He it is Who held back their hands from you and your hands from them in the valley of Mecca after He had given you victory over them; and Allah is Seeing what you do.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī kaffa aydiyahum `ankum wa-aydiyakum `anhum bibaṭni makkata min ba`di an aẓfarakum `alayhim ۚ wakānallāhu bimā ta`malūna baṣīrā

ayas.arabic: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَٱلْهَدْىَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُۥ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَآءٌ مُّؤْمِنَـٰتٌ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَـُٔوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌۢ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا۟ لَعَذَّبْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
ayas.translation: It is they who disbelieved and turned you away from the Sacred Mosque and (turned off) the offering withheld from arriving at its destined place; and were it not for the believing men and the believing women, whom, not having known, you might have trodden down, and thus something hateful might have afflicted you on their account without knowledge-- so that Allah may cause to enter into His mercy whomsoever He pleases; had they been widely separated one from another, We would surely have punished those who disbelieved from among them with a painful punishment.
ayas.transliteration: humul ladhīna kafarū waṣaddūkum `anil masjidil ḥarāmi wal hadya ma`kūfan an yablugha maḥillah ۚ walawlā rijālun mu-minūna wanisā-un mu-minātul lam ta`lamūhum an taṭa-ūhum fatuṣībakum minhum ma`arratun bighayri `il-m ۖ liyudkhilallāhu fī raḥmatihi man yashā-u ۚ law tazayyalū la`adhhabnal ladhīna kafarū minhum `adhāban alīmā

ayas.arabic: إِذْ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا
ayas.translation: When those who disbelieved harbored in their hearts (feelings of) disdain, the disdain of (the days of) ignorance, but Allah sent down His tranquillity on His Apostle and on the believers, and made them keep the word of guarding (against evil), and they were entitled to it and worthy of it; and Allah is Cognizant of all things.
ayas.transliteration: idh ja`alal ladhīna kafarū fī qulūbihimul ḥamiyyata ḥamiyyatal jāhiliyyati fa-anzalallāhu sakīnatahu `alā rasūlihi wa`alal-mu-minīna wa-alzamahum kalimatat taqwā wakānū aḥaqqa bihā wa-ahlahā ۚ wakānallāhu bikulli shay-in `alīmā

ayas.arabic: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءْيَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا۟ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
ayas.translation: Certainly Allah had shown to His Apostle the vision with truth: you shall most certainly enter the Sacred Mosque, if Allah pleases, in security, (some) having their heads shaved and (others) having their hair cut, you shall not fear, but He knows what you do not know, so He brought about a near victory before that.
ayas.transliteration: laqad ṣadaqallāhu rasūlahur ru-yā bil ḥaqq ۖ latadkhulunnal masjidal ḥarāma in shā-allāhu āminīna muḥalliqīna ru-ūsakum wa muqaṣṣirīna lā takhāfūn ۖ fa`alima mā lam ta`lamū faja`ala min dūni dhālika fat-ḥan qarībā

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
ayas.translation: He it is Who sent His Apostle with the guidance and the true religion that He may make it prevail over all the religions; and Allah is enough for a witness.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī arsala rasūlahu bil hudā wadīnil ḥaqqi liyuẓhirahu `alad dīni kullih ۚ wakafā billāhi shahīdā

ayas.arabic: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَىٰهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسْتَغْلَظَ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعْجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًۢا
ayas.translation: Muhammad is the Apostle of Allah, and those with him are firm of heart against the unbelievers, compassionate among themselves; you will see them bowing down, prostrating themselves, seeking grace from Allah and pleasure; their marks are in their faces because of the effect of prostration; that is their description in the Taurat and their description in the Injeel; like as seed-produce that puts forth its sprout, then strengthens it, so it becomes stout and stands firmly on its stem, delighting the sowers that He may enrage the unbelievers on account of them; Allah has promised those among them who believe and do good, forgiveness and a great reward.
ayas.transliteration: muḥammadun rasūlullāh ۚ wal ladhīna ma`ahu ashiddā-u `alal-kuffāri ruḥamā-u baynahum ۖ tarāhum rukka`an sujjadan yabtaghūna faḍlan minallāhi wariḍwānā ۖ sīmāhum fī wujūhihim min atharis sujūd ۚ dhālika mathaluhum fit tawrāh ۚ wa mathaluhum fil-injīli kazar`in akhraja shaṭ-ahu fa-āzarahu fastaghlaẓa fastawā `alā sūqihi yu`jibuz zurrā`a liyaghīẓa bihimul kuffār ۗ wa`adallāhul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti minhum maghfiratan wa-ajran `aẓīmā
